[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /obj/misc/wallpaper.c

* A wallpaper object for playerhousing * * To create a roll with a pattern, just call make_roll( ) * on one. * * To apply this wallpaper to a playerhousing wall, you also need * a pot of glue and a paint brush. * * @author Una * @27th August, 2002 * *

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/object.c
